title: Nandu Kuppuswamy, Senior Finance Executive joins as 3Lines Partner - WFMZ Allentown
content: Nandu Kuppuswamy, Senior Finance Executive joins as 3Lines Partner  WFMZ Allentown
description: DENVER, Feb. 12, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- Nandu Kuppuswamy, CFA, the former Head of Investor Relations at Sandstone Capital, >$1B AUM hedge fund, has joined 3Lines as a partner and Chief
